title: The Impact of Electronic Medical Records on BPJS Claims and Physician Performance
details: SA Winarsih, B Widjanarko, F Agushybana - Jurnal Indonesia Sosial Teknologi, 2024
abstract: With the digital transformation, Electronic Medical Records (EMR) have become crucial for operational efficiency and better healthcare. By the end of 2023, all Indonesian healthcare facilities are expected to implement EMR (Regulation No. 24 …
